The vviddovves teares a comedie. As it was often presented in the blacke and white Friers. Written by Geor. Chap. Chapman, George, 1559?-1634.
[80] p.
Printed [by William Stansby] for Iohn Browne, and are to be sold at his shop in Fleet-street in Saint Dunstanes Church-yard, London : 1612.
Printer's name from STC. Signatures: [A]² B-K⁴ L² . Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
